sentences.sentence: Solaire - Really Cool Carports for Really Cool Cars!
sentences.translation: 太阳能-真的很酷车棚对于真正酷车！

sentences.sentence: As a manufacturer of specially produce high-quality aluminum alloy carports, we possess senior Japanese designer and development team.
sentences.translation: 作为一家专业生产高品质铝合金车棚的制造商，我们拥有日本资深设计人员及开发队伍。

sentences.sentence: Instead of garages, many had "carports" -shelters attached to the house that are open at the front, the better to display gleaming cars.
sentences.translation: 建于房旁的镂空的车棚——而非车库；是为了房主们更好的卖弄自己闪耀的汽车。
